p: First reports showed that CHIKV infection of human embryonic kidney 293 cells (HEK-293T) leads to an increased number of the microtubule-associated protein 1A/1B light-chain 3 (LC3) puncta and augmentation of membrane-bound vacuoles, suggesting that CHIKV infection triggers an autophagic response ( Krejbich-Trotot et al., 2011). Accordingly, CHIKV replication was dramatically reduced when autophagy was blocked biochemically or by RNA interference ( Krejbich-Trotot et al., 2011).
